location_name: Saut du Day - Waterfall on the French border
location_short_de': Saut du Day or Cascade du Day is a nice waterfall near Vallorbe and Ballaigues in the west of Switzerland.
location_long_de': A nice walk to climb Mont Pèlerin, culminating at an altitude of 1,080 metres. This ridge to the north of the town of Vevey is home to a panoramic tower, from which the view of Lake Geneva is splendid. It should be noted, however, that this tower is subject to a charge.
